description:
Desert Tycoon Roller Coaster offers you to knockout your rivals on snowy asphalt roads across treacherous mountains. Feel the rush of addictive arcade racing fever on ultimate winner event. It’s not some contest against traffic racer you will battle against pro rally racer in world. The best of snow racing games and snowmobile racing games for free is here. Snowmobile simulator 3d with the blend of snowmobile games 3d and arctic cat extreme snowmobile racing will definitely win your soul at first vision.
Warning! Be careful, this application may attract you on many hours, don't forget to have a rest at least every 20 minutes!
Desert Tycoon Roller Coaster is the most realistic 3D drift cart racing simulation on mobile devices, and yet easy to control and fun to play. Fame of world champion racer never comes for free. You have to get the best sports cart and grab opportunity during chasing. Now a new race is going on. Get into your cart and prepare for a fast drift across offroads, snow and dirt.
Time to forget other Desert Tycoon Roller Coaster racing games and experience the finest of snow racing games. It's easy, thrilling, exciting, and highly addictive snowmobile games 3d! So go ahead and race your tremendous snowmobile simulator 3d to the finish line and become a great champion in Desert Tycoon Roller Coaster.
Desert Tycoon Roller Coaster GamePlay:
The game is all about racing and the gameplay is very simple! The basic goal in this game is to race against the other snow drift carts and obtain the 1st position. You have to complete the assigned number of laps in the given specific time limit to gain access to next level. Our aim is to only maneuver our Drift cars skillfully and reach to the finish point as soon as possible.

DESERT TYCOON ROLLER COASTER FEATURES:
• Incredible 3D graphics.
• Knockout Race mode.
• Easy and intuitive controls.
• Furious racing opponents to challenge your cars racer skills
• HD graphics with extreme weather snowfall and fog effects to bring new challenges+
• Music and HD effects
